description.value:
This operation evaluates parameters passed as input against the decision support rule identified by the Library resource. It returns the computed clinical decision support result and/or errors. The Library resource identifies the clinical decision rule and define its parameters.
The operation is idempotent. ### Input - 1..1 Parameters: HL7 FHIR [Parameters](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/parameters.html) resource containing input parameters for the clinical decision support computation.This should either be a QuestionnaireResponse or an Observation for evaluation.
### Output Upon success this operation returns an GuidanceResponse resource containing the decision support result.
